member.name: WS_XML_BOOL_TEXT
member.summary: A Boolean value that represents the text "true" or "false".

member.name: WS_XML_BOOL_TEXT.text
member.summary: The base type for all types that derive from .

member.name: WS_XML_BOOL_TEXT.value
member.summary: The Boolean value. 0 represents the text "false", while 1 represents the text "true".
